issue.title: Closes #97 - Create Range class for Fluo API
Fixes #98 - Moved API & MapReduce classes to their own module.
issue.body:
Pull Request for #98

Organized packages in core module.  Created FluoFactory class so users
can create FluoClient or FluoAdmin from API using reflection.  Core now
generates test jar to allow other modules to use utility test classes.
Formatted Maven pom files to use two spaces.  Configuration class was
renamed to Environment.

issue.title: Make properties helper classes consistent w/ FluoFactory
issue.body:
#98 introduced a new class called FluoFactory which has two methods that take a Properties object.   The existing classes that help users programattically build a properties object do not align with these two methods.   When I thought about writing the documentation that would describe how a user would use the existing properties helper classes with the new FluoFactory methods, I knew it was a train wreck.

One solution is to create one helper class.  Another solution is to create a helper per FluoFactory method.

issue.title: Closes #113 Adding required Sonatype OSS properties to poms to allow for...
Finalize API
issue.body:
Use ByteBuffers instead of ByteSequence
Minimize external dependencies in API
Put API in maven module
